sayeng accepietis virtutem spiritus sancti venientis vos c̄ say ye shal take vertu holy ghoost comyng cause holy ghoost sente trynyte therfore maketh preest blessyng name fader sone holy ghoost ¶secondly blessyng wherof lord spekyth hys appostles sayth venite benedicti patris mei percipite regnum c̄ say come blessyd god fader take possessyon royalme thyrdly sayd blessyng may sygnefye blessyng lord made whan wold ascende vnto heuen thende deuoute oryson may ascende hym blysse paradyse therfore sone enclyneth hym self saith oryson thus begynneth placeat tibi sanctum trinitas moche say holy trynyte praye ye vouchesauf take thys holy sacrefyse acceptable also theym whome haue consecrate body lerd per xpristum dominum nostrum amen ende masse somme preestys whyle take fro vestementes say saynt iohans gospel somme saye offyce lady saynt iohans gospel sayd 〈◊〉 mysterye hit conteynyng 〈◊〉 tenour saynt iohan maketh • cyon humanyte ioyne • vnyed dyuynyte sente testymonage wytnesse deuyne lyght whiche lyght al creature enlumyned preest saith grace lawdyng thankyng god benefaytes someuer wyl knowe vnderstonde wel parfytely noble vertu noble mysterye exposycnon masse lete hym wel consydere enprynte right parfytelye wythin hys herte alle tho thynges beforne conteyned creature thus doyng shal mowe haue certeyn knowlege god shal mowe ordeyne dresse hys conscyence sayd soo praye god gyue v grace doo suche seruyce soo good prayer therwyth may acquyre gete holy blysse paradyse amen endeth noble historye exposicion masse foloweth twelue article feythe thyse ben twelue artycles crystyn feythe euery crysten man woman oughte byleue stedfastlye fermelye otherwyse may sauyd sythe haue wytte reason twelue artycles nombre appostles made hem stablysshed holden kepte whiche fyrst longeth fader seuen sone foure holy ghoost foundemente feythe byleue trynyte fader sone holy ghoost one god thre persones al thyse artycles conteyned crede fyrst thus beleue god fader almyghty creatour heuen erth thys fyrst artycle layed saynt peter crede second apperteyneth sone godhede say thys god suche beleue ihesu cryst lord onley sone god fader ouȝt men vnderstonde byleue semblable like egal fader al thynges bylongyng godhede one selfe lyke thynge wyth fader saufe persone lyke persone fader thys artycle made layed crede saynt iohan euangelyste thyrd fourth artycles folowen crede apperteynen son • humanyte say man mortal whiche thyrd artycle conteyned conceyued holy ghoost borne vyrgyne marye vertu werke holy ghoost mannes werke vyrgyne marye abode euer virgyn hys byrthe thys artycle layed saynt iames brother saynt iohan euangelyste crede fourth artycle bylongeth passyon say suffred vnder poncepylate paynym iuge tyme iherusalem instytued romayne vnder whiche ihesu cryst iuged wrongfully requeste felon iewes crucefyed dede put sepulcre artycle layed saint andrewe fyfthe artycle descended helle hys deth haue oute delyuer sowles holy faders alle fro begynnyng world deyed veray contrycyon repentaunce feythe hope shold • uyd hym cause fyrst mannes synne al must descende helle abyde good certeyn hope ihesu cryste sone god shold come delyuer promysed hys prophetes reason wold descende helle vnderstonde parte helle dampned whyche dede theyr synnes thoo drewe oute helle dampned pardurably euer thys artycle layed trede saynt phelyppe vj artycle hys resurrexyon wete thyrd day dethe consumme accomplysshe scryptures rose dethe vnto lyf ageyn apperyd dyscyples approued resurrexyon many maners space fourty dayes artycle layed saynt thomas seuenth artycle thys fourty day resurrexyon whan ete wyth dyscyples al appertelye ascended aboue al creature heuen vnto right hande fader sytteth artycle layed saynt bartylmewe crede viij artycle shall come dome day iuge bothe lyuyng dede good euyl shal rendre yelde euery one thys shal haue deserued world ¶ ben artycles longyng sone laste artycle beforesayd layed saynt mathew theuangelyste crede ix thre laste artycles belongen holy ghoost artycles requyren men byleue holy ghoost yefte loue god fader sone fro whome come 〈◊〉 v al wele grace one god one thynge wyth fader wyth sone sauf persone persones fader sone artycle layed crede saynt iames brother saynt symon saynt iude tenthe artycle thys beleue holy chyrche general communyon sayntes say companye al sayntes trewe men ben shal vnto consumyng ende world fro begynnyng world gyder feyth ihesu cryste artycle vnderstonde vij sacramentes holy chirche wete baptesme confirmacion sacramente aulter sacramente mariage wedlock penaunce confessyon last holy vnccion artycle layed saynt symon xj article byleue remyssyon synnes god gyueth vertue sacramentes holy chirche thys artycle layed saynt iude brother saynt symon iude betrayed lord ihesu cryste xij artycle byleue general resurrexyon bothe sowles bodyes perdurable euerlastyng glorye paradyse god shall gyue shal deserue good feyth thorugh good werkys artycle gyueth also vnderstonde contrarye deth peyne perdurable without ende god hath apparaylled shal dampned article oughte vnderstonde suche manere euery one good euyl shal iuged dome day reysed fro dethe lyf ageyn owne propre body shal receyue rewarde gwerdon bothe body sowle togyder shal haue deseruyd beyng lyf mortal thefore day good creature shal glorefyed bothe body sowle lyf euer shal laste article layed saynt mathyas appostle frende god thus endeth twelue artycles feythe thus endeth legende named latyn legenda aurea saye englysshe golden legende lyke golde passeth valewe alle metalles thys legende excedeth alle bookes wherin ben conteyned alle hygh grete festys lord festys blessyd lady lyues passyons myracles many sayntes hystoryes actes al allonge afore made mencyon whiche werke haue accomplisshed commaundemente requeste noble puyssaunte erle special good lord wyllyam erle arondel haue fynysshed westmestre twenty day nouembre yere lord cccc lxxxiij fyrst yere reygne kyng rychard thyrd ¶by wyllyam caxton
